alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 11:32AM PST until January 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts up to 40 mph. Winds will ease a bit later this afternoon, but will pick up again after midnight tonight. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...Until noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
